column4: ok thanks, btw should ubuntu see my cpu details? it says unknown...
with load it varias the clock rate to conserv power
ah... u mean cool n quiet thingie?
to conserve power if cpu utilization all of a suden boosts to 100+ percent the OS will detect it and up the CPU frequency
it doent need to be running at 4000mhz to chat on irc
so the cpu is detected ok?
btw any way to make the "termina" icon on the taskbar?
i think you can right click and select remove
i want to add it... and its not among the "selectable": icons...
drag and dropping it on the task bar should work
thanks :)  do u happen to know how can i function my mouse buttons?
assign functions to my mouse buttons, back/forward/paste etc... like ms intelimouse ms driver in XP.
